attributes.additional_details: I would like the death penalty brought back for treason, don't charge terrorists with terrorism, charge them with treason. I believe treason to be any attack on any member of the armed forces, politicians and the Police.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Hold a referendum on whether to reinstate the death penalty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602435

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to bring back the death penalty for specific offences, such as treason or terrorism, but decisions about what offences to prosecute a person for are a matter for the Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.
